img_above_text:
![Wukong Tiger 28.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c1/Wukong_Tiger_28.jpg)
As you head up the stairs of the darkened cave, be sure to keep an eye on the right of the chamber for a long wooden chest that holds **Will** and 2 **Silk**.
img_below_text:
When you finally find your way outside, look to the right to find a sloping sandy path leading down. There’s actually a ledge ahead in the ruined building with a chest, but getting it to can be the most aggravating experience unless you use a trick.
![Wukong Tiger 29.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/31/Wukong_Tiger_29.jpg)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Tiger 28.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c1/Wukong_Tiger_28.jpg)
As you head up the stairs of the darkened cave, be sure to keep an eye on the right of the chamber for a long wooden chest that holds **Will** and 2 **Silk**."
        - Following Text: "When you finally find your way outside, look to the right to find a sloping sandy path leading down. There’s actually a ledge ahead in the ruined building with a chest, but getting it to can be the most aggravating experience unless you use a trick.
![Wukong Tiger 29.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/31/Wukong_Tiger_29.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from *Black Myth: Wukong*, showing the player character approaching the entrance of a dark cave. The environment features a rocky, barren landscape with twisted trees and a wooden structure framing the cave. A red circular marker highlights a point of interest inside the cave, suggesting an area to explore or an objective to investigate. This follows a section where players are advised to search for a chest containing items and precedes guidance on navigating a sandy path outside.
